### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=-40.5, y=40.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=-40.5, y=40.5) 

### Boiler at position(x=1.5, y=1.0)
Consists of boiler(position x=1.5, y=1.0), connected to pipes at positions (x=-0.5, y=1.5) and (x=3.5, y=1.5)

### Boiler at position(x=1.5, y=3.0)
Consists of boiler(position x=1.5, y=3.0), connected to pipes at positions (x=-0.5, y=3.5) and (x=3.5, y=3.5)

### Boiler at position(x=-24.5, y=32.0)
Consists of boiler(position x=-24.5, y=32.0), connected to pipes at positions (x=-26.5, y=32.5) and (x=-22.5, y=32.5)

### Offshore pump at position(x=-7.5, y=25.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position x=-7.5, y=25.5), connected to pipe at position (x=-7.5, y=24.5)

### Offshore pump at position(x=-18.5, y=27.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position x=-18.5, y=27.5), connected to pipe at position (x=-19.5, y=27.5)

### Offshore pump at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position x=-16.5, y=26.5), connected to pipe at position (x=-16.5, y=25.5)

### Offshore pump at position(x=-13.5, y=26.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position x=-13.5, y=26.5), connected to pipe at position (x=-13.5, y=25.5)

### Offshore pump at position(x=-3.5, y=27.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position x=-3.5, y=27.5), connected to pipe at position (x=-3.5, y=26.5)

### Offshore pump at position(x=-1.5, y=28.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position x=-1.5, y=28.5), connected to pipe at position (x=-1.5, y=27.5)

### Offshore pump at position(x=0.5, y=30.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position x=0.5, y=30.5), connected to pipe at position (x=1.5, y=30.5)

### Offshore pump at position(x=1.5, y=32.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position x=1.5, y=32.5), connected to pipe at position (x=2.5, y=32.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using boiler without fuel
- Ensure there is coal in the inventory before using the boiler
- Make sure to provide fuel to the boiler to avoid EntityStatus.NO_FUEL status
### Errors when placing pipes without connection points
- Ensure the pipe has connection points before attempting to place it
- Make sure the pipe is connected to a valid entity, such as a boiler or offshore pump, before placing it
### Errors when using steam engine without input liquid
- Ensure there is a valid input liquid, such as water, connected to the steam engine
- Make sure the steam engine is connected to a power network to avoid EntityStatus.NOT_CONNECTED status
